ONTAP REST API

Simple, powerful, workflow-driven automation

  • Resources
  • Spotlight
  • Discord #ontap-api
    • Home
    • ONTAP
    • ONTAP REST API

ONTAP offers an expansive workflow-driven REST API, enabling storage automation and integrating storage management solutions

The ONTAP REST API exposes a simplified external representation of ONTAP that's efficient both in response to API calls and in its use of ONTAP resources.

Automating ONTAP with ONTAPI/ZAPI or NMSDK?
Start your move to ONTAP REST API

Brand new to ONTAP automation?
Get Started with ONTAP REST API

  • NetApp Learning Services

Note: NetApp ONTAPI (ZAPI) will reach its end of availability (EOA) in January 2024 (updated Feb 20, 2023).
For customers using ONTAPI to automate their storage management tasks, ONTAP 9.13.1 will be the final version to offer normal support ONTAPI.
For more information on continued access beyond 9.13.1, refer to CPC-00410: EOA - ONTAPI updated Feb 20, 2023.

What's New?

The NetApp PowerShell Toolkit introduces REST API functionality for cmdlets to support features available through ONTAP 9.12.1 with both REST and ONTAPI (ZAPI).

NetApp PowerShell Toolkit 9.12.1.2302 is now available for Windows, Mac, and Linux, and works with PowerShell 5.1, 7.0.3, and later versions. It provides full cmdlet support for the ONTAP features available, in most cases with no changes required to your existing scripts.

Get started
